events.name: onLoad
events.description: Handler that is called when the image load.
events.description_zh: 加载图像时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onError
events.description: Handler that is called when the image fails to load.
events.description_zh: 加载映像失败时调用的处理程序。

loading.description: A loading strategy to use for the image.

isBlurred.description: Whether the image should have a duplicated blurred image at the background.
isBlurred.description_zh: 图像的背景中是否应有重复的模糊图像。

isZoomed.description: Whether the image should be zoomed when hovered.
isZoomed.description_zh: 悬停时是否应缩放图像。

removeWrapper.description: Whether to remove the wrapper element. This will cause the image to be rendered as a direct child of the parent element. If you set this prop as true neither the skeleton nor the zoom effect will work.
removeWrapper.description_zh: 是否删除包装元素。这将导致图像呈现为父元素的直接子元素。如果将此道具设置为“true”，则骨架和缩放效果都不起作用。

disableSkeleton.description: Whether the image should disable the skeleton animation while loading.
disableSkeleton.description_zh: 图像是否应在加载时禁用骨架动画。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the image slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为映像插槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: wrapper
slots.description: Image wrapper, it handles alignment, placement, and general appearance.
slots.description_zh: 图像包装器，它处理对齐、放置和一般外观。

slots.name: zoomedWrapper
slots.description: The wrapper slot for the zoomed image it avoids the image content to overflow the parent container.
slots.description_zh: 缩放图像的包装槽 它避免了图像内容溢出父容器。

slots.name: blurredImg
slots.description: The wrapper slot for the duplicated blurred image.
slots.description_zh: 复制的模糊图像的包装槽。
